resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Hi Team,

Please find below the steps:-

1. Install Genymotion with VM on windows 7. 
2. Download and start a device using Genymotion.
3. Open Titanium Studio.
4. Select On Windows--> Preferences --> PlatForm --> Android
5. Click on Emulator link.
6. Give path for Genymotion.exe, player.exe, VBoxManage. And click on Apply.
7. Then Click on OK.
8. You will not be able to see the Genymotion Device in this studio Run settings.
9. When you go back to check the path for Genymotion.exe, player.exe and VBoxManage. you will see that they blank and path entered earlier is not retained.

Please look into this and let me know if any further information is needed.
fields.summary: Not able to load Genymotion Device in titanium sdk
